desc.Bolstering: When any non-boss enemy dies, its death cry empowers nearby allies, increasing their maximum health and damage by 20%.
desc.Fortified: Non-boss enemies have 20% more health and inflict up to 40% increased damage.
desc.Necrotic: All enemies' melee attacks apply a stacking blight that inflicts damage over time and reduces healing received.
desc.Raging: Non-boss enemies enrage at 30% health remaining, dealing 100% increased damage until defeated.
desc.Sanguine: When slain, non-boss enemies leave behind a lingering pool of ichor that heals their allies and damages players.
desc.Skittish: Enemies pay far less attention to threat generated by tanks.
desc.Teeming: Additional non-boss enemies are present throughout the dungeon.
desc.Tyrannical: Boss enemies have 40% more health and inflict up to 20% increased damage.
desc.Volcanic: While in combat, enemies periodically cause gouts of flame to erupt beneath the feet of distant players.
desc.Explosive: Creatures have a chance to summon an Explosive Orb at a nearby location that will explode, inflicting damage 50% of the player’s maximum health as damage.
desc.Quaking: Players will periodically Quake, inflicting 20% of the player’s maximum health as damage and interrupting spell casts of themselves and nearby allies.
desc.Grevious: While below 90% health, players are afflicted with Grievous Wound.
desc.Bursting: When slain, non-boss enemies explode, causing all players to suffer 10% of their maximum health in damage over 4 seconds. (5% every 2 seconds) This effect stacks.
